scenes.narration: In the last 2 hours, 6 events unfolded in the Chained repository, driven by a lone developer's determination.

characters.name: Build Guardian
characters.line: I've tracked 4 pull requests. Let's see what stories they tell.

scenes.narration: 4 pull requests merged into main. The codebase evolves.

characters.name: Merge Oracle
characters.line: The merge is complete. Well done, github-actions[bot].
